content: > ** view the video tutorial here 1 ** this pattern comes in 2 sizes with notes on how to adjust size to make a larger section to add a larger photo measurements small 2 75 tall x 2 5 wide large 3 25 tall x 3 wide super fun and fast project to work up great gifts for your pet loving family and friends >*note that this pattern is free to view on my blog but the purchase of the pattern helps support me in writing more patterns thank you so much for your support **join my facebook community and connect with other crochet enthusiasts ** https //www facebook com/groups/simplyhookedbyjanet **follow me on instagram ** @simplyhookedbyjanet this pattern has been fully tested to ensure accuracy copyright protected you may not redistribute pattern after purchase or publish any part as your own including photos you may sell finished products and if possible reference back to this pattern and/or give credit to simply hooked by janet as the original designer 1 https //youtu be/mezclccnl6q si=z0fdlychndgx-now
